mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT IP.ITEM_PRIORITY AS priority , IP.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode , IML.ITEM_NAME AS itemName , ISNULL(DR.ONE_TIME, 0) AS oneTime , ISNULL(DR.TWO_TIME, 0) AS twoTime , ISNULL(DR.THREE_TIME, 0) AS threeTime , ISNULL(DR.PROD_QTY_RETURN, 0) AS prodQtyReturn , ISNULL(DR.PROD_QTY, 0) AS prodQty , ISNULL(PRL.PROD_QTY, 0) AS exmallQty FROM I_ITEM_PRIORITY IP LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.ITEM_CODE, A.RELEASE_DATE, A.ONE_TIME, A.TWO_TIME, A.THREE_TIME, A.PROD_QTY, A.PROD_QTY_RETURN FROM I_DUOLAC_RELEASE A INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST B ON A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE ) DR ON IP.ITEM_CODE = DR.ITEM_CODE AND DR.RELEASE_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, #{searchDateInput} ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.ITEM_CODE, SUM(A.PROD_QTY) PROD_QTY FROM I_PROD_RELEASE_LIST A INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST B ON A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.UPDATE_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, #{searchDateInput} ) GROUP BY ITEM_CODE ) PRL ON PRL.ITEM_CODE = IP.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN I_ITEM_MASTER_LIST IML ON IP.ITEM_CODE = IML.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND IP.ITEM_TYPE_GSP = #{prodTypeGsp} -- ORDER BY PROD_PRIORITY
AND IML.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' + #{prodName} + '%'
-- ORDER BY PROD_PRIORITY ) AA WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT priority , MAX(itemCode) AS itemCode , MAX(itemName) AS itemName , SUM(oneTime) AS oneTime , SUM(twoTime) AS twoTime , SUM(threeTime) AS threeTime , SUM(prodQtyReturn) AS prodQtyReturn , SUM(prodQty) AS prodQty , SUM(exmallQty) AS exmallQty FROM ( SELECT IP.ITEM_PRIORITY AS priority , IP.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode , IML.ITEM_NAME AS itemName , ISNULL(DR.ONE_TIME, 0) AS oneTime , ISNULL(DR.TWO_TIME, 0) AS twoTime , ISNULL(DR.THREE_TIME, 0) AS threeTime , ISNULL(DR.PROD_QTY_RETURN, 0) AS prodQtyReturn , ISNULL(DR.PROD_QTY, 0) AS prodQty , ISNULL(PRL.PROD_QTY, 0) AS exmallQty FROM I_ITEM_PRIORITY IP LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.ITEM_CODE, A.RELEASE_DATE, A.ONE_TIME, A.TWO_TIME, A.THREE_TIME, A.PROD_QTY, A.PROD_QTY_RETURN FROM I_DUOLAC_RELEASE A INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST B ON A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE ) DR ON IP.ITEM_CODE = DR.ITEM_CODE AND DR.RELEASE_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, #{searchDateInput} ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.ITEM_CODE, SUM(A.PROD_QTY) PROD_QTY FROM I_PROD_RELEASE_LIST A INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST B ON A.PROD_CODE = B.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.UPDATE_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, #{searchDateInput} ) GROUP BY ITEM_CODE ) PRL ON PRL.ITEM_CODE = IP.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN I_ITEM_MASTER_LIST IML ON IP.ITEM_CODE = IML.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND IP.ITEM_TYPE_GSP = #{prodTypeGsp} -- ORDER BY PROD_PRIORITY ) AA GROUP BY ROLLUP(priority) ) AAA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CD_ITEM AS cdItem , ITEM_NAME AS itemName , ITEM_TYPE_GSP AS itemTypeGsp , ITEM_PRIORITY AS priority , YY_INV AS yyInv , QT_GOOD_INV AS qtGoodInv from( SELECT BBB.CD_ITEM, BBB.ITEM_NAME, max(BBB.ITEM_TYPE_GSP) ITEM_TYPE_GSP, max(BBB.ITEM_PRIORITY) ITEM_PRIORITY, BBB.YY_INV, SUM(BASIC_STOCK) AS QT_GOOD_INV FROM ( SELECT BB.CD_ITEM, X.ITEM_NAME, X.ITEM_TYPE_GSP, X.ITEM_PRIORITY, BB.YY_INV, BB.YM_IO, BB.QT_DELIVERY - BB.QT_DUOLAC - BB.QT_EXMALL BASIC_STOCK FROM ( SELECT CD_ITEM ,LEFT(YM_STANDARD, 4) YY_INV ,LEFT(YM_STANDARD, 4) + '00' YM_IO ,QT_GOOD_INV QT_DELIVERY ,0 QT_DUOLAC ,0 QT_EXMALL FROM I_PROD_BASIC_STOCK WHERE 1=1 AND YM_STANDARD = LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash}, 4)+'00' UNION ALL SELECT a.CD_ITEM, a.YY_INV, a.YM_IO, SUM(a.QT_DELIVERY) QT_DELIVERY, SUM(a.QT_DUOLAC) QT_DUOLAC, SUM(a.QT_EXMALL) QT_EXMALL FROM I_PROD_INV a WHERE 1=1
AND YM_IO >=CONVERT(NCHAR(4), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash}, 4)) + '01' AND YM_IO <= LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash}, 6)-1
GROUP BY a.CD_ITEM, a.YY_INV,a.YM_IO
UNION ALL
SELECT Z.cdItem CD_ITEM, Z.yyInv YY_INV, Z.ymIo YM_IO, SUM(Z.qtDelivery) QT_DELIVERY, SUM(Z.qtDuolac) QT_DUOLAC, SUM(Z.qtExmall) QT_EXMALL FROM ( SELECT 'SFA' AS cdPlant, ITEM_CODE AS cdItem, LEFT(UPDATE_DATE,4) AS yyInv, REPLACE(UPDATE_DATE, '-', '') ymIo, 0 AS qtDelivery, SUM(AAA) AS qtDuolac, SUM(BBB) AS qtExmall FROM ( SELECT UPDATE_DATE, ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'DUOLAC' THEN SUM(PROD_QTY) ELSE 0 END aaa, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'EXMALL' THEN SUM(PROD_QTY) ELSE 0 END bbb, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'DUOLAC' THEN SUM(SALES_PRICE_SUM) ELSE 0 END ccc, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'EXMALL' THEN SUM(SALES_PRICE_SUM) ELSE 0 END ddd FROM ( SELECT LEFT(RELEASE_DATE, 7) UPDATE_DATE, IPL.ITEM_CODE, 'DUOLAC' AS MALL_CODE, DR.PROD_QTY, 'DUOLAC' AS MALL_SITE, DR.SALES_PRICE_SUM FROM I_DUOLAC_RELEASE DR INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST IPL ON IPL.PROD_CODE = DR.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND RELEASE_DATE >=CONVERT(NCHAR(6), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash} , 6)) + '01' AND RELEASE_DATE <= #{searchDateNoDash}
UNION ALL
SELECT LEFT(UPDATE_DATE, 7) UPDATE_DATE, IPL.ITEM_CODE, PRL.MALL_CODE, PRL.PROD_QTY, PRL.MALL_SITE, 0 AS SALES_PRICE_SUM FROM I_PROD_RELEASE_LIST PRL INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST IPL ON IPL.PROD_CODE = PRL.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND UPDATE_DATE >=CONVERT(NCHAR(6), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash} , 6)) + '01' AND UPDATE_DATE <= #{searchDateNoDash} AND PRL.MALL_SITE = 'EXMALL'
) A GROUP BY UPDATE_DATE, ITEM_CODE, MALL_SITE ) AA GROUP BY UPDATE_DATE, ITEM_CODE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DUZON' AS cdPlant , ITEM_CODE AS cdItem , LEFT(DT_SO,4) AS yyInv , DT_SO AS ymIo , SUM(QT_DELIVERY) qtDelivery , 0 qtDuolac , 0 qtExmall FROM ( SELECT LEFT(DT_SO, 6) DT_SO ,ITEM_CODE ,QT_DELIVERY FROM I_DUZON_DELIVERY_QT_LIST WHERE 1=1
AND DT_SO >=CONVERT(NCHAR(6), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash} , 6)) + '01' AND DT_SO <= #{searchDateNoDash}
) C GROUP BY DT_SO, ITEM_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.cdItem, Z.yyInv,Z.ymIo ) BB INNER JOIN ( select IP.ITEM_CODE, IML.ITEM_NAME, IP.ITEM_TYPE_GSP, IP.ITEM_PRIORITY from I_ITEM_PRIORITY IP LEFT OUTER JOIN I_ITEM_MASTER_LIST IML ON IP.ITEM_CODE = IML.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND IP.ITEM_TYPE_GSP = #{prodTypeGsp} -- ORDER BY PR.PROD_TYPE_GSP, PR.PROD_PRIORITY ) x ON BB.CD_ITEM = x.ITEM_CODE ) BBB group by BBB.CD_ITEM, BBB.ITEM_NAME, BBB.YY_INV ) BBBB ) XX ON AAA.itemCode = XX.cdItem WHERE 1=1
AND AAA.itemName LIKE '%' + #{prodName} + '%'
ORDER BY AAA.priority

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT prodPriority , MAX(itemCode) AS itemCode , MAX(prorityProdCode) AS prorityProdCode , MAX(prodName) AS prodName , SUM(oneTime) AS oneTime , SUM(twoTime) AS twoTime , SUM(threeTime) AS threeTime , SUM(prodQtyReturn) AS prodQtyReturn , SUM(prodQty) AS prodQty , SUM(exmallQty) AS exmallQty FROM ( SELECT PP.PROD_PRIORITY AS prodPriority , IPL.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode , PP.PROD_CODE AS prorityProdCode , PML.PROD_NAME AS prodName , ISNULL(DR.ONE_TIME, 0) AS oneTime , ISNULL(DR.TWO_TIME, 0) AS twoTime , ISNULL(DR.THREE_TIME, 0) AS threeTime , ISNULL(DR.PROD_QTY_RETURN, 0) AS prodQtyReturn , ISNULL(DR.PROD_QTY, 0) AS prodQty , ISNULL(PRL.PROD_QTY, 0) AS exmallQty FROM I_PROD_PRIORITY PP LEFT OUTER JOIN I_DUOLAC_RELEASE DR ON PP.PROD_CODE = DR.PROD_CODE AND DR.RELEASE_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, #{searchDateInput}) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROD_CODE, SUM(PROD_QTY) PROD_QTY FROM I_PROD_RELEASE_LIST WHERE 1=1 AND UPDATE_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, #{searchDateInput}) GROUP BY PROD_CODE ) PRL ON PRL.PROD_CODE = PP.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN I_PROD_MASTER_LIST PML ON PP.PROD_CODE = PML.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST IPL ON IPL.PROD_CODE = PP.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PP.PROD_TYPE_GSP = #{prodTypeGsp} -- ORDER BY PROD_PRIORITY ) AA GROUP BY ROLLUP(prodPriority) ) AAA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CD_ITEM AS cdItem , PROD_NAME AS prodName , PROD_TYPE_GSP AS prodTypeGsp , PROD_PRIORITY AS prodPriority , YY_INV AS yyInv , QT_GOOD_INV AS qtGoodInv from( SELECT BBB.CD_ITEM, BBB.PROD_NAME, max(BBB.PROD_TYPE_GSP) PROD_TYPE_GSP, max(BBB.PROD_PRIORITY) PROD_PRIORITY, BBB.YY_INV, SUM(BASIC_STOCK) AS QT_GOOD_INV FROM ( SELECT BB.CD_ITEM, X.PROD_NAME, X.PROD_TYPE_GSP, X.PROD_PRIORITY, BB.YY_INV, BB.YM_IO, BB.QT_DELIVERY - BB.QT_DUOLAC - BB.QT_EXMALL BASIC_STOCK FROM ( SELECT CD_ITEM ,LEFT(YM_STANDARD, 4) YY_INV ,LEFT(YM_STANDARD, 4) + '00' YM_IO ,QT_GOOD_INV QT_DELIVERY ,0 QT_DUOLAC ,0 QT_EXMALL FROM I_PROD_BASIC_STOCK WHERE 1=1 AND YM_STANDARD = LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash}, 4)+'00' UNION ALL SELECT a.CD_ITEM, a.YY_INV, a.YM_IO, SUM(a.QT_DELIVERY) QT_DELIVERY, SUM(a.QT_DUOLAC) QT_DUOLAC, SUM(a.QT_EXMALL) QT_EXMALL FROM I_PROD_INV a WHERE 1=1
AND YM_IO >=CONVERT(NCHAR(4), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash}, 4)) + '01' AND YM_IO <= LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash}, 6)-1
GROUP BY a.CD_ITEM, a.YY_INV,a.YM_IO
UNION ALL
SELECT Z.cdItem CD_ITEM, Z.yyInv YY_INV, Z.ymIo YM_IO, SUM(Z.qtDelivery) QT_DELIVERY, SUM(Z.qtDuolac) QT_DUOLAC, SUM(Z.qtExmall) QT_EXMALL FROM ( SELECT 'SFA' AS cdPlant, ITEM_CODE AS cdItem, LEFT(UPDATE_DATE,4) AS yyInv, REPLACE(UPDATE_DATE, '-', '') ymIo, 0 AS qtDelivery, SUM(AAA) AS qtDuolac, SUM(BBB) AS qtExmall FROM ( SELECT UPDATE_DATE, ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'DUOLAC' THEN SUM(PROD_QTY) ELSE 0 END aaa, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'EXMALL' THEN SUM(PROD_QTY) ELSE 0 END bbb, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'DUOLAC' THEN SUM(SALES_PRICE_SUM) ELSE 0 END ccc, CASE WHEN MALL_SITE = 'EXMALL' THEN SUM(SALES_PRICE_SUM) ELSE 0 END ddd FROM ( SELECT LEFT(RELEASE_DATE, 7) UPDATE_DATE, IPL.ITEM_CODE, 'DUOLAC' AS MALL_CODE, DR.PROD_QTY, 'DUOLAC' AS MALL_SITE, DR.SALES_PRICE_SUM FROM I_DUOLAC_RELEASE DR INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST IPL ON IPL.PROD_CODE = DR.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND RELEASE_DATE >=CONVERT(NCHAR(6), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash} , 6)) + '01' AND RELEASE_DATE <= #{searchDateNoDash}
UNION ALL
SELECT LEFT(UPDATE_DATE, 7) UPDATE_DATE, IPL.ITEM_CODE, PRL.MALL_CODE, PRL.PROD_QTY, PRL.MALL_SITE, 0 AS SALES_PRICE_SUM FROM I_PROD_RELEASE_LIST PRL INNER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST IPL ON IPL.PROD_CODE = PRL.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND UPDATE_DATE >=CONVERT(NCHAR(6), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash} , 6)) + '01' AND UPDATE_DATE <= #{searchDateNoDash} AND PRL.MALL_SITE = 'EXMALL'
) A GROUP BY UPDATE_DATE, ITEM_CODE, MALL_SITE ) AA GROUP BY UPDATE_DATE, ITEM_CODE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DUZON' AS cdPlant , ITEM_CODE AS cdItem , LEFT(DT_SO,4) AS yyInv , DT_SO AS ymIo , SUM(QT_DELIVERY) qtDelivery , 0 qtDuolac , 0 qtExmall FROM ( SELECT LEFT(DT_SO, 6) DT_SO ,ITEM_CODE ,QT_DELIVERY FROM I_DUZON_DELIVERY_QT_LIST WHERE 1=1
AND DT_SO >=CONVERT(NCHAR(6), LEFT(#{searchDateNoDash} , 6)) + '01' AND DT_SO <= #{searchDateNoDash}
) C GROUP BY DT_SO, ITEM_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.cdItem, Z.yyInv,Z.ymIo ) BB INNER JOIN ( select IPL.ITEM_CODE, PR.PROD_CODE, PML.PROD_NAME, PR.PROD_TYPE_GSP, PR.PROD_PRIORITY from I_PROD_PRIORITY PR LEFT OUTER JOIN I_ITEM_PROD_LIST IPL ON PR.PROD_CODE = IPL.PROD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN I_PROD_MASTER_LIST PML ON PR.PROD_CODE = PML.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PR.PROD_TYPE_GSP = #{prodTypeGsp} -- ORDER BY PR.PROD_TYPE_GSP, PR.PROD_PRIORITY ) x ON BB.CD_ITEM = x.ITEM_CODE ) BBB group by BBB.CD_ITEM, BBB.PROD_NAME, BBB.YY_INV ) BBBB ) XX ON AAA.itemCode = XX.cdItem WHERE 1=1
AND AAA.prodName LIKE '%' + #{prodName} + '%'
ORDER BY AAA.prodPriority
